MetaData.MetaDataItem: Z-Wave PIR Movement Sensor(EU) - 300 SeriesAN148 On/Off Plug Specification： Protocol Z-Wave Frequency AN148-2: 868.42 MHz (Germany) AN148-3: 868.42 MHz (UK) Code Type Learning Transceiver Yes Operating Range Up to 100 feet LED Indication Yes Max Load AN148-2: 3500W AN148-3: 2990W Power AC220-240V/50Hz Operating Temp. 0°C-40°C (32°F~104°F) Protection Degree Indoor use

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/24/xml
Updated Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/35/xml

Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: When Basic Set Command is sent where contains a value, the receiver will take it for consideration; for instance, if a lamp module is received the Basic Set Command of which value is decisive as to how bright of dim level of lamp module shall be.

Value.label: Enable/Disable Detecting
Value.Help: The Detecting function can be Disabled of Enabled.

Value.label: Sensitivity Level
Value.Help: 1 Means lowest sensitivity and 10 means highest.

Value.label: Re-trigger Interval Setting
Value.Help: Adjust the interval of being re-triggered afer the detector has been triggered in seconds.

Value.label: Lux Level
Value.Help: Sets minimum Lux Level of ambient illumination necessary for Motion Detector to trigger.

Value.label: On-Off Duration
Value.Help: The duration determines how long before the module sends an Off after being triggered.
